name: Saltmarch Flats
economy_niches: brine-derived preservation goods for ship provisioning
small-scale boat repair focused on hull salt-treatment
culture_adjustments: boat-name kinships dominate work gangs rather than inland kin-lines
oral tide-songs adapted to mudflat timing and salt-harvest cues
greater mobility — large seasonal migration to/from flats
artisan-runic prestige lower; pragmatic craft rites tied to salt work
market dispute-resolution emphasizes cargo claims and shares
constraints: limited arable land — reliance on imports for staples
few permanent towns; seasonal labor logistics constrain growth
notes: labor and trade peak around lowest spring tides
salt stockpiles are strategic state assets and targets in crises
